abstract: The status of the player item.
overview:
## Discussion

When a player item is created, its [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVPlayerItem/status-swift.property] is [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVPlayerItem/Status-swift.enum/unknown], meaning its media hasn’t been loaded and has not yet been enqueued for playback. Associating a player item with an [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVPlayer] immediately begins enqueuing the item’s media and preparing it for playback. When the player item’s media has been loaded and is ready for use, its status will change to [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVPlayerItem/Status-swift.enum/readyToPlay]. You can observe this change using key-value observing.

For possible values, see [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVPlayerItem/Status-swift.enum].

# status

**Instance Property**

The status of the player item.

## Declaration

```swift
nonisolated var status: AVPlayerItem.Status { get }
```

## Discussion

When a player item is created, its [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVPlayerItem/status-swift.property] is [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVPlayerItem/Status-swift.enum/unknown], meaning its media hasn’t been loaded and has not yet been enqueued for playback. Associating a player item with an [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVPlayer] immediately begins enqueuing the item’s media and preparing it for playback. When the player item’s media has been loaded and is ready for use, its status will change to [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVPlayerItem/Status-swift.enum/readyToPlay]. You can observe this change using key-value observing.

For possible values, see [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVPlayerItem/Status-swift.enum].

## Determining readiness

- **AVPlayerItem.Status**: The statuses for a player item.
- **error**: The error that caused the player item to fail.
